ThingDef.Name: Gun_3HST_4mm_AutoRailPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona rail autopistol
ThingDef.description: An automatic pistol chambered in 4mm railgun sabot. Standard sidearm for 3HST combatants.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_3HST_Light_Machine_Railgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona rail LMG
ThingDef.description: Standard issue light machinegun of 3HST planetary forces. Thanks to its twin barrel design, this machinegun is capable of extreme fire rate and high burst count before needing to cool down, but at the cost of bulky size and noxious accurancy. Rail LMG are loaded with piercer rounds that sacrifice damage for extra overpenetration and suppression.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_3HST_9mmDMR_Bond
